title: 1.5 bedroom apartment for rent
posting_body: Beautiful sun drenched 1.5 bedroom unit in two family home.
Shared mudroom in back entrance with designated shelving unit and hooks for coats/shoes/bags.
Front entrance has a small private mud room with coat closet.
Huge living room that can be used as living and dining room with decorative brick fireplace.
Four season sunroom/office with glass pane doors, perfect for working from home.
Fully equipped kitchen with plenty of counter space, new appliances, new cabinets, dishwasher, and island with two stools.
Also kitchen has a chalkboard wall and pegboard for storage.
Private basement with laundry and plenty of storage.
Large driveway with two designated spots.
Backyard has a shared paved patio, raised bed garden available for use, second paved seating area in the far back.
There is a two car detached garage that will remain owner occupied but a garage parking space can be negotiated for an additional cost.
This is a beautifully restored old colonial home with tons of character.
Perfect for a professional looking for a little more space than the standard 1 bedroom or for a couple.

Perks of location: 1.2 miles from commuter rail (city is currently putting in bike lines), easy access to Mass pike and rte 9, easy access to Whole Foods & Trader Joe’s, walk to Dunkin, Buckley Bar, Bowditch Field/track Included: water Tenant pays: Oil heat, electricity, cable/internet
